page.title: 16MY DAY, EAST BARKWITH
page.content: {8.00am. }I get up from a deep sleep, walk out of the bed-room and stumble downstairs. I jump down the last two steps and end up in our kitchen. Dad is putting his boots on and Mum is packing our lunches. I plonk myself down by the gas fire and warm myself up. Dad finishes putting his boots on and walks out saying,"Cheerio." "Bye," Mum, Gavin and I say. After getting warmed through by the fire, Gavin, my younger brother, and I scamper upstairs to get dressed. {8.15am.}After getting dressed, by putting on my jeans and my blue jumper, I charge downstairs and put my trainers on. After that I get washed in Imperial Leather soap and go for a breakfast of Shreddies, sugar and cool milk.
